abstract: luann de lesseps returns from rehab : `` i 'm doing great ''
article: the countess has returned ! luann de lesseps is back home following her rehab stint . the real housewives of new york star was arrested on christmas eve for battery and intoxication . `` it 's good to be home . i 'm doing great , '' the reality star tweeted on tuesday , january 23 . `` spending time with friends and family . thanking everyone for your continued good wishes and support . '' the mother of two apologized for her drunken behavior on christmas day and blamed the incident on the end of her marriage to tom d'agostino jr. .

`` i want to offer my most sincere apologies to anyone that i might have offended with my behavior , '' she said in a statement . `` this was my first time in palm beach since my wedding and being here brought up buried emotions . '' she continued , `` i am committed to a transformative and hopeful 2018 . '' following the arrest , luann decided to check into a rehab facility to get a handle on her issues . credit : youtube `` after the events of last saturday night in palm beach , i am truly embarrassed , '' she shared in another statement .

`` i have decided to seek professional guidance and will be voluntarily checking into an alcohol treatment center . '' she continued , `` i intend to turn this unfortunate incident into a positive life changing event . '' the 52-year-old married tom on new year 's eve 2016 , but the pair announced their separation just 7 months later . we hope you are feeling better , luann !
